Method Detail

findMetaInfFolder

public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IFolder findMetaInfFolder(java.lang.String pProjectName)
                                                            throws MissingResourceException
Provides the meta-inf folder of a EJB project.

Parameters:
pProjectName - project name
Returns:
the resource of the meta-inf folder
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when project name specified is null, empty string, the project does not exist or is not accessible, or the project is not an ejb project
MissingResourceException - either the project doesn't exist in the workspace or it doesn't contain a meta-inf folder
java.lang.RuntimeException - when error occured while accessing java model

isEjb3Project

public static boolean isEjb3Project(java.lang.String projectName)
Check whether a project is an ejb 3 project

Parameters:
projectName - the name of the project; cannot be null or empty string
Returns:
true in case the project specified is a ejb 3 project; false otherwise
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the project name specified is null, empty string
java.lang.IllegalStateException - when the project does not exist or is not accessible
java.lang.RuntimeException - when an error occurred while accessing the project metadata

isWeb25Project

public static boolean isWeb25Project(java.lang.String projectName)
Check whether a project is an web 2.5 project

Parameters:
projectName - the name of the project; cannot be null or empty string
Returns:
true in case the project specified is a web 2.5 project; false otherwise
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the project name specified is null, empty string
java.lang.IllegalStateException - when the project does not exist or is not accessible
java.lang.RuntimeException - when an error occurred while accessing the project metadata

Retrieve the project instance by project name

Parameters:
projectName - the project name
Returns:
the project instance
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the project name specified is null or empty string
java.lang.IllegalStateException - when the project does not exist or is not accessible

Get the java project instance

Parameters:
project - the project as eclipse resource
Returns:
the java project instance
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when project null or the project is not accessible

refreshResource

public static void refreshResource(org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource resource)
                            throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Refresh the resource specified. Refresh depth used is zero

Parameters:
resource - the resource to be refreshed
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
See Also:
IResource.DEPTH_ZERO

refreshProjectByResource

public static void refreshProjectByResource(org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource resource)
                                     throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Refreshes the project the resource specified belongs to. Refresh depth used is infinite.

Parameters:
the - resource which project is to be refreshed
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the resource specified is a workspace root
See Also:
IResource.DEPTH_INFINITE
